summary: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.
cast: Marjoe Gortner|Caroline Munro|Christopher Plummer|David Hasselhoff|Robert Tessier|Joe Spinell|Nadia Cassini|Judd Hamilton|Hamilton Camp|Salvatore Baccaro|Omero Capanna|Hélène Chauvin|Candy Clark|Dirce Funari|Donald Hodson|Cindy Leadbetter|Gianfranco Moroni|Riccardo Petrazzi|Victoria Zinny
title: Star Crash, choque de galaxias
